text.text_translated:
Many people add to the problem of throwing away clothes.  
They give unwanted clothes to charity.  
They may not notice it.  
Charity shops cannot sell all the clothes.  
Fast fashion becomes old very fast.  
It is low quality, so people cannot recycle it.  
People do not want to buy fast fashion second‑hand.  
So many clothes are thrown away.  
Charity shops send unsold clothes abroad.  
This creates money problems and problems for the environment.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Many people add to throw‑away clothes problem but may not notice it.  
They give their old clothes to charity.  
Charity shops cannot sell all of them.  
Fast fashion becomes old very fast and is often low quality.  
People do not want to buy fast fashion second‑hand.  
A lot of clothes are thrown away.  
Some unsold clothes are sent to other countries.  
This creates more money problems and more environmental problems.
